Kagi - Full-Time - Product Manager and multiple engineering positions - Remote (Worldwide)

Kagi is on a mission to humanise the web, making it more accessible, ethical, and user-centred. We're building a friendly version of the internet where users can explore, learn, and interact with confidence and ease.

As a small team tackling big problems, we need self-directed individuals with strong work ethics. We are looking for experienced professionals for the following roles:

  • Product Managers

  • Android and iOS Developers

  • Search Index Team

  • Core Backend Team (Crystal language expertise)

  • Site Reliability Engineers (SRE)

  • Core Machine Learning Team

Compensation: while we can't match VC-backed or big-tech salaries, we offer competitive compensation including equity, allowing you to grow with us.

Learn more about our job opportunities and how to apply at: https://help.kagi.com/kagi/company/hiring-kagi.html

Learn more about Kagi: https://help.kagi.com/kagi/company/
